Uses of Class
com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2.TextBox

  • Packages that use TextBox 
    Package Description
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2  

    • Uses of TextBox in com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2

      Methods in com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2 that return TextBox 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TextBox TextBox.setHorizontalFocusSwitching(boolean horizontalFocusSwitching)
      If set to true, the TextBox will switch focus to the next available component to the left if the cursor in the TextBox is at the left-most position (index 0) on the row and the user pressed the 'left' arrow key, or vice versa for pressing the 'right' arrow key when the cursor in at the right-most position of the current row.
      TextBox TextBox.setMask(Character mask) 
      TextBox TextBox.setReadOnly(boolean readOnly) 
      TextBox TextBox.setText(String text) 
      TextBox TextBox.setVerticalFocusSwitching(boolean verticalFocusSwitching)
      If set to true, the component will switch to the next available component above if the cursor is at the top of the TextBox and the user presses the 'up' array key, or switch to the next available component below if the cursor is at the bottom of the TextBox and the user presses the 'down' array key.
      Methods in com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2 with parameters of type TextBox 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TextBox.DefaultTextBoxRenderer.drawComponent(TextGUIGraphics graphics, TextBox component) 
      TerminalPosition TextBox.DefaultTextBoxRenderer.getCursorLocation(TextBox component) 
      TerminalSize TextBox.DefaultTextBoxRenderer.getPreferredSize(TextBox component)
